speech: Sorry i'm not programmed to curse.
I rarely curse and when I do it is cause people make me.
I apologize for my rude rantings.
Listen up, i'm a family friendly bot, i do not curse.
Aaah i'm sorry! What did i do wrong? ;;
If i said something bad or offensive, you could send me feedback to correct this. Please make a screenshot of the reaction i gave.
